structure.unit: SANITARIANS, WATER PLANT OPERATORS, AND WATER WELL CONSTRUCTION PRACTICES

law.catch_line: Grounds for revocation of certificate -- Hearings.
law.text: The cabinet shall have the power to revoke the certificate of registration of any registrant for unprofessional conduct or the practice of any fraud or deceit in obtaining registration, or any gross negligence, incompetency, or misconduct in the practice of environmental health sanitation. Administrative hearings conducted under authority of this section shall be conducted in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 136, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 309, sec. 8, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 102, sec. 7, effective July 1, 1960.
